title: Vintage Taster's Choice label type?
content:
Any guesses? Mildly Copperlatey. Was this ever digitized?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054747im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tasters_Choiceold_3953.jpg)
author: dcastillo

comments.content: Most probably a custom designed logo, but I'm quite confident we can find something similar.
That's the closest match I can find off hand it seems. T-26's September Bold has some characteristics to it as well--probably the closest match on my machine anyhow.
I wonder if Treacyfaces.com doesn't have something similar.

They had to pay $15.6 million to the model on the label since they didn't pay him for the use [[read article](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054747/http:/www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?f=/news/archive/2005/02/01/financial2146EST0154.DTL)]. I hope it isn't the same thing with the font. ;-)
